name: Ymana
description:
Experimental game made for Indiecade 2015 submission. Reuploaded to Itch so it doesn't get lost. This was my first complete Unity game, which I used to practice shaders and grass generation.

Mouselook, click, and WASD + E to play. Submerge the five pillars to find the treasure. Your strength is always fading, however!
